sentence.Network_en: Today's bicycles are descendants of the earlier velocipede.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天的自行车是从早期的脚踏车发展而来的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 1862年他们制造142部后来所称的脚踏车(velocipedes)，到1865年米肖家族一年生产400部。1866年他们的技工拉勒芒(Pierre Lalleme…

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French vélocipède, from Latin velox, veloc- 'swift' + pes, ped-'foot'

means.word_mean: 1. any of several early bicycles with pedals on the front wheel
2. a vehicle with three wheels that is moved by foot pedals
